dublin_core.dcvalue: An outbreak of acute hemorrhagic conjunctivitis AHC caused by coxsackie A24 CA24 virus occurred in South Korea in 2002 CA24 was isolated for the first time from patients with AHC Therefore this study was conducted to understand the transmission routes and prevent another AHC outbreaks
Journal of preventive medicine and public health = Yebang Å¬ihakhoe chi
Epidemiologic investigation into the outbreak of acute hemorrhagic conjunctivitis in gyeongju-city, South Korea, in 2002.
